nodes.bodyText: If the name is already escaped(replaced "$" to "$$"), could it happen to a case that we did a second replaceAll escape to make it un-readable.
Field names in the data are never escaped. We only escape them in the mask tree as it has special meaning for $ (eg $*, $start etc)
